QuestData.Title: The Unseen Guests
QuestData.Description:
Dreadlords.
Of course. Of course they would come back now of all times. I half suspected they returned during the drought.
I was not entirely convinced you were not one, the first time I saw you. They have gotten more clever over the eons since they fled Revendreth.
But not clever enough... I think.
Come, Maw Walker. Follow me and do not make a fuss. Keep your weapon ready. The envoy you brought is not as well intentioned as you might have thought.
QuestData.LogDescription: Join the Stonewright as she investigates the Envoy.
